selector.one_description: The most essential commands for your balance

selector.five_description: Commands for server creators who want to configure everything for yourself!

embed.title: Help
embed.description:
Welcome to the help! Here you can find out all the available bot commands.

Choose a category from the `drop list` below.
`<>` - Mandatory argument
`[]` - Optional argument

server_control.viewing_data_value:
`/admin list` - View the data of all members of the server!
 * It is possible to specify another database by writing an additional argument!
server_control.user_data_value:
`NOTE!` To be able to manage member data, the parameter `Private server` must be enabled!
 * You can find more information in /private-server

`/admin [key] [value]` - Setting the value for the member:
EXAMPLE:
- The `/admin list` command outputs all data like this:```elixir
${interaction.user.id}-xp = 10

# Your KEY is "${interaction.user.id}-xp"
# KEY value - 10
# If you see the prefix "-xp", we can guess that it is a EXPERIENCE (If there is no prefix, it is cash!) 
# Since you own the user ID, this value is all yours! 
# If you want to change this value, type: /admin ${interaction.user.id}-xp 200
# This sets your experience to 200. Turn on developer mode in Preferences -> Advanced and then click on the desired member.```

errors.not_a_link: This is not a link to the image

image.message_content:
Are you sure you want to send this image for consideration? 
Because for the false image (sent for fun) you can get blocked from using the bot!

**If you do not know what image to attach - call the command WITHOUT filling parameters!**

embed.title: Bonus for voting
embed.description: In this command you can learn how to earn donat-currency for free
embed.welcome_value:
Switch between the buttons to find out more details
Voting on each of the sites will bring you `+<1> <server_donate>`
embed.choose_site_btn: Choose a site to get a link
embed.how_to_get_field: How do I get donate currency?
embed.how_to_get_value:
`1.` Go to the website.
`2.` Log in via your discord, if you need to do so
`3.` Click on `Rate` or `Vote` button
`4.` Take a screenshot of what you did (preferably with the current time displayed)
`5.` Submit a screenshot using this slash command parameter
`6.` Wait for verification and get `+<1> <server_donate>` per vote :)
* You can also write a comment of your own, it would be my pleasure!

embed.title: Invitation to the server
embed.description: Hi! You can invite the bot by clicking [here](<1>)
embed.bugs_value: - We sincerely ask you to report any bugs you encounter on our [support server](<1>)

errors.calc_nan: Something... But definitely not a number!
errors.calc_infinity: A number beyond our comprehension. Infinity.
errors.calc_div_by_zero: Division by zero is not possible.

embed.title: Calculator
embed.description: Solve simple examples with this command
embed.error_value: It is most likely that you specified the wrong example which may have letters or invalid characters. As a rule, the reason for the error is written in the solution itself.
embed.error_floating_field: The answer has a floating point problem!
embed.error_floating_value: We displayed it anyway, just like a normal calculator. Keep that in mind!
